task.title: Set up the MediaPlayer
task.shortdesc: The MediaPlayer interface for Android encapsulates the functionality and behavior of a media player.

context.p: provides one implementation of the MediaPlayer interface, the DefaultMediaPlayer class. When you need video playback functionality, instantiate DefaultMediaPlayer.
context.note: Interact with the DefaultMediaPlayer instance only with the methods that are exposed by the MediaPlayer interface.

step.cmd: Instantiate a MediaPlayer using the public DefaultMediaPlayer.create factory method, passing a Java Android application context object.
Call MediaPlayer.getView to get a reference to the MediaPlayerView instance.
Place the MediaPlayerView instance in a FrameLayout instance, which places the video on the device's screen.

taskbody.result: The MediaPlayer instance is now available and properly configured to display video content on the device screen.
